definition: Causing concern or giving rise to doubts; usually used to describe something that is questionable or worrisome.
examples: Es ist bedenklich, wie wenig sie sich um ihre Gesundheit kümmert.
It is concerning how little she cares about her health.
The rising crime rate is alarming.
Seine Entscheidung ist bedenklich und könnte negative Konsequenzen haben.
His decision is questionable and could have negative consequences.
